room.name: the bedroom
room.long_description:
You are standing in what looks to be a bedroom. Every piece of 
furniture in this room is bright pink except for a white door on 
the northern wall. The bed looks comfy - its sheets have a pretty 
floral pattern on them.

room.name: the living room
room.short_description: This is the cozy living room.
room.long_description:
This room is warm and dimly lit, making it very cozy. This is 
likely the living room of the house - it has a big comfy couch, a nice 
red carpet, and a brick fireplace.

room.name: the kitchen
room.short_description: This is the bright modern kitchen.
room.long_description:
Upon entering the room you notice right away that it's the kitchen. 
It has a large counter with a shiny granite surface and steel bar 
stools. The fridge has a cute flower drawing pinned to it by a 
star-shaped magnet.

room.name: the bathroom
room.long_description:
The first thing you notice about this room is that music is being 
loudly blasted from a stereo on the floor. You are clearly in a 
bathroom, but not a normal one. The sink is covered in a goopy, 
glowing yellow substance, the bath looks like its made out of 
cardboard, and the toilet is completely covered in blue glitter. 
There are coloured strobe lights going off and a huge disco ball hangs 
from the ceiling.

room.name: outside
room.long_description:
It's very suddenly bright and sunny - you are outside! There is a 
beautiful flower garden to your left with an overgrown stone path 
leading into it. There is a net on the ground near the stone path.

room.name: the garden
room.short_description: You are in the peaceful garden.
room.long_description:
You look around and see a wide variety of colourful flowers. This is a garden! 
The stone path you followed here ends up leading to a rather large stone 
waterfountain. The trees surrounding the area provide a nice cool shade. 
It's so peaceful here... you begin to feel slightly sleepy.

room.name: the attic
room.short_description: You are in the empty attic.
room.long_description:
You walk up the stairs to find yourself in a big empty room. The floor is wooden 
and the walls are made of concrete. There is no furniture in sight. 
The most interesting thing about the room is the big crack on the southern wall. 
There is clearly nothing here. The stairs that lead back downstairs look very appealing...

item.name: net
item.desc: A medium-sized, delicate-looking net with a butterfly symbol on its handle.

item.name: drawing
item.desc: The flower has been drawn using pink, green, and yellow crayons; it's very pretty.

item.name: test tube
item.desc:
An empty glass test tube - upon closer inpection you notice that there are some 
shiny blue flecks inside it. You wonder what had been in it before.

item.name: butterfly
item.desc:
This butterfly is beautiful - it has big orange wings that have an intricate 
pattern on them. The pattern consists of many thin black lines and white spots.
